summary: A Massive Modpack that contains 200+ Mods to improve the Vanilla experience of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
FEATURES OF THE MODPACK

Version BETA 1.0

Enjoy the Ultimate Vanilla Experience in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim

-Enchanced and better looking cities, totally rebuilt Helgen and improved villages and forts

-Immersive sounds featuring the Sounds of Skyrim mod series by Cliffworms

-Better combat AI and stealth options for followers

-20+ new followers including Archers, Heavy Warriors and Assassins

-A lot of new NPCs just to make places more Alive

-Tons of new, craftable and tradable weapons including Spears, Daggers, Halbeards, Throwing Axes, Quarterstaffs and more

-Added to crafting a lot of not-craftable items

-Now you can find different types of skulls including Dragon Skull, Mammoth Skull, Vampire and Werewolf Skull

-Bug Fixing for Skyrim and its DLCs featuring the Unofficial Patch by Arthmoor

-Graphic Enchancement such as HD textures for Flowers and Herbs,facial textures improvement for NPCs, better interior lights, better and clear water and mossy rocks

-Marriage Improved featuring the Marriage Dynamic Outfits by flexcreator

-Dynamic and Epic Random Encounters featuring the Immersive Factions mod and lots of new monster and creatures including Special Boss Monsters

-Weight and Damage adjustments for Weapons and Items (Potions, Dragon Bones...)

-New Places to explore such as the Whiterun Arena, Hideouts and New Houses for the Dragonborn

-New craftable Armors: Warchief Armor,silver armor,custom color mage chainmail armor and more


NOTES

IMPORTANT: DAWNGUARD,DRAGONBORN and HEARTFIRE expansions pack are REQUIRED for the modpack

please remember that the mod is currently in developement, if you find any bug or any type of error, write a comment on the Nexus page of the mod and i will fix it.

THIS IS THE ENGLISH VERSION OF U.V.E , actually i'm not interested in making a translation for my modpack but i'm italian, so if any italian want to make a translation contact me at kriptogenmods@gmail.com

i'm not the creator of the mods into U.V.E.


QUICK INSTALLATION GUIDE

1) open the .rar file and extract the "U.V.E. (beta v1.0)" folder

2) open the "Mods" folder

3) go the Skyrim "data" folder C:Program Files (x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimdata


4) copy all the files in the U.V.E "Mods" folder than drop the files in the Skyrim "data" folder

5) Enjoy the Ultimate Vanilla Experience Modpack
author: Kriptogen
